Text:
Readme from the archive:

****************************************************

This is a crack for Dark Messiah of Might and Magic original version.
Was tested in Single player mode, and it works fine. 
There are NO viruses / trojans in original archive. 

Install the game, backup original mm.exe game file and replace it by this noCD.

End User Agreement.

Anyone may use this file to play without CD, but I encourage you to buy the game (I did!), game creators deserve their money. 
Free distribution of this noCD is allowed as long as ALL files in archive remain intact. DO NOT REMOVE POSTER OR THIS README! You may add custom content (nfos, etc) if it does not do any harm to the end user.
*************************************************************

Please seed this file after download at least for a week!

doghy, it's just a demo exe which can be used as a nocd for the final version. Works poorly, but there are no alternative exe cracks yet. 
The game itself is huge (7 gigabytes in size) and download speed is awfully slow. Too many leechers, over 30000 for now.
